tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: A doctor is usually given a place next to God. He plays a significant role in saving our lives. So, it is our responsibility to take some of our time and express our gratefulness to our doctor. This will not require much effort, but it will bring a smile on our doctor‚Äôs face who has not given priority to his personal life while saving our life.Doctors are busy people as they treat a lot of patients on a daily basis. Getting a note of gratitude from even one patient is sure to make their day, making them feel that all the hard work they do, daily, does not go in vain. Thank you letter to a doctor is written to show him your gratitude. It is a sign of thankfulness towards them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Went there for consultation regarding child's fever. The doctor not only prescribed medicines but also explained our queries about the health issue and guided us about proper nutrition of our child. The most satisfying part was the attention that he paid to our queries.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Mr. Arpan Saha is a nice person and very friendly. He started to treat my younger daughter for frequent snizzing issue. She is under his treatment now and we observed a bit improvement after starting medication. It will take time to complete the medicine courses as prescribed by him. We are satisfied with his way of diagnosis and treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We consulted the doctor online and he seemed very friendly. He explained to us the situation and prescribed medicines, although he suggested in clinic visitation for proper understanding of the problem (to which I agree). What was very surprising was that he himself messaged after 2 days to enquire about the well being of my kid. I would highly recommend Dr Arpan.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor was in hurry. He did not ask even the age of the child. He took 10 seconds maximum on the call

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: As babies are not able to describe what are they feeling or what type of problem she /he is having, then any pediatrician role is very important to proper diagnose the problem and what will be the further treatment. As a pediatrician Dr. Saha has given the timely treatment to our kid and diagnose the problem. He explained all the pros and cons and suggested further for better treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
